attributes.action: Keep the East Coast Mainline in public ownership and not re-franchise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-franchising of the east coast mainline would betray (yet again) the british travelling public and the beleagured staff working in all of the rail franchises in the uk.
The Government should undertake to place the east coast mainline under a not for profit organisation similar to the Network Rail Model.
 The Government should evenually seek to place the whole rail network under the a not for profit arrangement ending the ridiculous dogma that the ony model for the railways is through franchising.
Rail franchising is a flawed and discredited dogma that largely benefits only the greedy and disadvantages the British People through ever increasing rail fares and ever decreasing service levels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
